T.query: select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'4') or questionposition = 0

F.query: select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 'f' and questioncode >'4') or questionposition = 0
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode <'4') or questionposition = 0
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and questioncode >'4') or (questionposition = 0 and maxresponses = -1)
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 't' and externalsystemid >'4') or questionposition = 0
select id,surveyid from questions where required = 't' and questioncode >'4'
select id,surveyid from questions where (required = 'f' and questioncode >'4') or questionposition = 1
